Tag_Propose_delete.description: Afaik it was decided to keep all the info on the Ainigmata Ostraka page, removing these individual pages (like we also removed the memory pages related to for example the Black Shuck, and Fly Agaric)

General_Description: '''Elbow Greece''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Ready for a long hike? At the top of this mountain, you can see the entirety of [[Greece]]! Follow the road west to the [[Altar of Prometheus|Statue of Prometheus]], then your long journey north begins. Find me at the peak in [[Oropos Heights]].''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
